Text:
[II] Through Christ, God our Father has gathered together the Church. With joy let us pray, saying:
[IR] Send Your Holy Spirit onto the Church!
[I1] You want to gather, through one baptism in the Spirit, all those who exalt the name of Christ,
[I2] grant believers to be of one heart and one soul.
[I1] You who desire the Spirit to fill the world,
[I2] help all people build justice and peace within creation.
[I1] Lord God, Father of all, You want to gather together all Your scattered children, in unity of faith,
[I2] illuminating the universe by the grace of the Holy Spirit.
[I1] By Your Spirit, You renew all things,
[I2] heal the sick, comfort the afflicted, and to all, give salvation.
[I1] By the Spirit, You raised Your Son from the dead,
[I2] likewise, raise our bodies from dust to eternal life.
Changes: 2022-06-05 - Paul Prins: Initial translation of these intentions
